responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "32CD49D44CC8B05665C723BDB911D52B", "The Restructuring Dimensional Intra-Sphere, affectionately referred to as Ardis, is a teleportal mechanism created by Olek Bellsong. Its intended function was to puncture reality to create a portal to other realms. Due to the impending Harbinger Apocalypse, Bellsong was instructed to abandon the project in favor of assisting int he construction a monumental divine engineered portal. Being stored within the dungeon of the Tower Arcana, Ardis is believe to have been destroyed by Duzahk hordes during the Harbinger Apocalypse. All that could be recovered were the red and blue crystal levers. In honor of Olek, the crystals would be mounted onto the gravestones of his associates.")
name: MIDD_0015_PTS_ClockworkCodex_16
